metadata.title: Founders Letter, 2012: Five Years Later
metadata.description: MZ shares his note entitled "Founder's Letter, 2012," written at the announcement of FB's IPO.

contents.participant:
I wrote this letter exactly five years ago when we announced Facebook's IPO. The letter is an explanation of how I see our community and our role in the world.
Five years later, the world has changed a lot and so have we. I'm almost done writing a new letter about how I see our community and our role evolving, and I'll share it soon.
